title: Intern at Corteva Agriscience
body: I worked as an intern at Corteva Agriscience during summer of 2019 and returned for a second internship during the summer of 2020. I primarily worked with .NET Core and Angular, as well as many Azure services, such as Functions, SignalR, Blob Storage, and Cosmos.

title: Intern at Sears Seating
body: I worked as an intern at Sears Seating during the summer of 2018 in the test department. Despite the majority of the internship being focused on non-programming tasks, I did automate part of my job by creating a tool using Qt (C++) to search for and open documents within a deeply nested folder structure. This saved me around 5 clicks per document.

title: Earlier Work
body: I worked serveral summer jobs, including an internship or two, prior to 2018. However, none had any programming-related content, so I won't elaborate here. If you want to learn more about them, check out my LinkedIn profile.
